!output bin
shru1_64 111111111111111111111111111111b
shru1_64 11111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111111b
shru1_64 101010101b
!output signed
shru1_64 8
shru1_64 200200
shru1_64 -1
shru1_64 0x00000000ffffffff
shru1_64 0xffffffffffffffff
shru1_64 1
!output hex
shru1_64 0xe1e1e1e1e1e1e1e1
shru1_64 0x1e1e1e1e1e1e1e1e
shru1_64 0xf0f0f0f0f0f0f0f0
!quit
